ingredients: 3 tablespoons lime juice, 1 cup sliced red onion, cut lengthwise, 15 cups cubed watermelon, 3 cups cubed English cucumber, 1 (8 ounce) package feta cheese, crumbled,   +   1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro,   cracked black pepper,   sea salt
nutrition: Total Fat 4g 4%, Saturated Fat 2g 12%, Cholesterol 14mg 5%, Sodium 182mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 14g 5%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 11g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 15mg 75%, Calcium 93mg 7%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 243mg 5%
